tool_description: Assigns appropriate rooms to scheduled courses based on capacity requirements, room type, and availability constraints.

course_schedules.description: List of courses with assigned time slots

room_types.description: Required room types for each course

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: course_schedules, capacity_requirements, and room_types arrays must have the same length.
Invalid capacity: Capacity requirements must be positive integers.
Unknown room type: One or more room_types are not recognized by the system.
No available rooms: No rooms meet the requirements for one or more courses.
Invalid building: One or more buildings in building_preferences do not exist.
usage: Provide course_schedules and capacity_requirements arrays of equal length. Optionally specify room_types and building_preferences to guide room assignment decisions.

unassigned_courses.description: Courses that could not be assigned rooms

capacity_warnings.description: Courses assigned to rooms with insufficient capacity
